org.apache.twill.yarn
Class YarnTwillRunnerService

java.lang.Object
  com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      org.apache.twill.yarn.YarnTwillRunnerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, TwillRunner, TwillRunnerService
public final class YarnTwillRunnerService
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
implements TwillRunnerService

An implementation of TwillRunnerService that runs application on a YARN cluster.

Parameters:
config - Configuration of the yarn cluster
zkConnect - ZooKeeper connection string

                              String zkConnect,
                              LocationFactory locationFactory)
Creates an instance.

Parameters:
config - Configuration of the yarn cluster
zkConnect - ZooKeeper connection string
locationFactory - Factory to create Location instances that are readable and writable by this service
Method Detail

setJVMOptions

public void setJVMOptions(String options)
This methods sets the extra JVM options that will be passed to the java command line for every application started through this YarnTwillRunnerService instance. It only affects applications that are started after options is set. This is intended for advance usage. All options will be passed unchanged to the java command line. Invalid options could cause application not able to start.

Parameters:
options - extra JVM options.

getJVMOptions

public String getJVMOptions()
Returns any extra JVM options that have been set.

See Also:
setJVMOptions(String)

scheduleSecureStoreUpdate

public Cancellable scheduleSecureStoreUpdate(SecureStoreUpdater updater,
                                             long initialDelay,
                                             long delay,
                                             TimeUnit unit)
Description copied from interface: TwillRunner
Schedules a periodic update of SecureStore. The first call to the given SecureStoreUpdater will be made after initialDelay, and subsequently with the given delay between completion of one update and starting of the next. If exception is thrown on call SecureStoreUpdater.update(String, RunId), the exception will only get logged and won't suppress the next update call.

Specified by:
scheduleSecureStoreUpdate in interface TwillRunner
Parameters:
updater - A SecureStoreUpdater for creating new SecureStore.
initialDelay - Delay before the first call to update method.
delay - Delay between completion of one update call to the next one.
unit - time unit for the initialDelay and delay.
Returns:
A Cancellable for cancelling the scheduled update.

lookup

public Iterable<TwillController> lookup(String applicationName)
Description copied from interface: TwillRunner
Gets an Iterable of TwillController for all running instances of the given application.

Specified by:
lookup in interface TwillRunner
Parameters:
applicationName - Name of the application.
Returns:
A live Iterable that gives the latest TwillController set for all running instances of the application when Iterable.iterator() is invoked.
